edu.bonn.cs.wmp.viewupdater
Class ViewUpdater

java.lang.Object
  edu.bonn.cs.wmp.viewupdater.ViewUpdater
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditTextViewUpdater
public abstract class ViewUpdater
extends Object

The view updater is responsible for informing a collaborative view of a change (in the form of a AwarenessEvent in the local document copy of the Collaborative Editing Framework.

Author:
Sven Bendel, Dirk Hering

Constructor Detail

ViewUpdater

public ViewUpdater()
Method Detail

hasInterestIn

public boolean hasInterestIn(de.hdm.cefx.awareness.AwarenessEvent event)
This method is called by WMPApplication to check if this view updater is interested in a particular new AwarenessEvent. This method is not really necessary for the functioning of the WMP concept, but was introduced to split up the decision making about the usefulness of a AwarenessEvent for a view updater and the actual processing.

Parameters:
event - the AwarenessEvent to be propagated in case this view updater is interested in it
Returns:
true, if this view updater wants to get notified about this AwarenessEvent, false otherwise

notifyOfAwarenessEvent

public abstract void notifyOfAwarenessEvent(de.hdm.cefx.awareness.AwarenessEvent event)
This method allows the processing of an incoming AwarenessEvent. It is called by WMPApplication on arrival of a new event if this view updater has returned true on the precedent call to hasInterestIn(AwarenessEvent).

Parameters:
event - the new AwarenessEvent
